articles.description: SSM Health started giving the second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine Tuesday to its healthcare workers after receiving 10,000 vaccines recently.

articles.title: South African variant unlikely to 'completely negate' COVID vaccines, scientist says - msnNOW
articles.description: A variant of the coronavirus first detected in South Africa is unlikely to completely negate the immunising effects of vaccines, a researcher studying it told Reuters.
